name: SF Weekly Coffup
tagline: iOS Developers drinking Coffee/Tea in San Francisco
body:
## What is this?

We get together every Wednesday morning at 8:30am - 10:00am. The location changes every week, the best way to keep up to date on the location is through a dynamic ics file. 

## Instructions
Copy and paste the following link into your calendar's "subscription" functionality **rather than downloading the static file**:

 `https://calendar.google.com/calendar/ical/ho60q57pauegr2ki4v9hhspvdo%40group.calendar.google.com/public/basic.ics`

Now your calendar software should be up to date. If you see the same location every week, you've probably accidentally downloaded the static ics. You'll need to try again.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
